data.message: The best part of my day is connecting easily with people and their ideas. FB has kept an open mind for the most part, on how people express themselves openly, controversially and politically. For all the forums built to be with "like minds" . . . Thank you! <3

replies.message: Aw stop, we're blushing, Carolyn! We really appreciate your feedback. We're glad to have you in our community. -Kate
Thanks to facebook my favorite tool of comunication...
We're glad you like it, Anita! Thanks for stopping by. -Austin

Buen día. Sugerencia: el face en general y ejemplo en este video que seria interesante que todos pudieran acceder a ver y leer o escuchar en otros idiomas , deberian estar subtitulado al español y en otros idiomas a elección.  Gracias.
